question: Grab app keeps crashing on iOS
answer: Try: 1) Update to latest iOS version 2) Reinstall Grab app 3) If persists, contact support with device model and iOS version

question: Why can't I log in to my driver account?
answer: Driver accounts may be locked for document verification. Check SMS/email for instructions or visit nearest Grab Driver Center.

question: GrabPay payment failed but amount deducted
answer: This is usually temporary authorization hold. Funds will return in 3-5 business days. Contact support with transaction ID for escalation.

question: How do I update my vehicle information?
answer: Driver app: Go to Profile > Vehicle Details > Update Documents. Requires approval which takes 1-2 business days.

question: GPS not working during ride
answer: Try: 1) Check location permissions 2) Switch to Waze/Google Maps in settings 3) Restart phone if issue persists

question: Can't book a ride – says no drivers available
answer: Try: 1) Expanding pickup radius 2) Changing payment method 3) Trying again during off-peak hours

question: How do I change my registered phone number?
answer: Go to Profile > Edit Profile > Tap on phone number. You’ll receive an OTP to verify your new number.

question: My promo code is not working
answer: Ensure: 1) You're eligible for the promo 2) It's not expired 3) It applies to your selected service. If still not working, contact support.

question: Why was I charged cancellation fee?
answer: Cancellation fees apply if you cancel after driver accepts or delay pickup. Check receipt for cancellation time. Dispute in Help Center if needed.

question: Can't top up GrabPay wallet
answer: Ensure your card is valid, has sufficient balance, and is 3D Secure enabled. Try another card or payment method if issue persists.

question: App stuck on loading screen
answer: Try: 1) Clearing cache/data 2) Reinstalling app 3) Checking for stable internet connection. Restart device if still stuck.

question: How to contact my driver after a trip?
answer: Go to History > Select Trip > Tap on 'Contact Driver'. Available only for a limited time post-trip.

question: Lost item in Grab ride
answer: Use app: History > Select Trip > Report Lost Item. We'll help connect you to the driver if possible.

question: Can't verify email address
answer: Check spam/junk folder. Make sure email is entered correctly. If not receiving OTP, try resending or updating email.

question: Why is my account temporarily suspended?
answer: Suspensions may occur due to policy violations or failed verifications. Check email for details or contact support for appeal process.

question: How to redeem GrabRewards points?
answer: Go to Rewards tab > Select reward > Tap 'Redeem'. Points will be deducted from your account upon successful redemption.

question: Why is my referral code not working?
answer: Ensure: 1) Code is valid 2) New user hasn't used it before 3) Both parties meet referral criteria. Contact support if issue persists.

question: How to report a driver for misconduct?
answer: Go to History > Select Trip > Report Driver. Provide details and evidence (if any) for investigation.

question: Why is my GrabFood order late?
answer: Check app for live status. Delays may occur due to traffic, restaurant prep time, or driver issues. Contact support if over 30 mins late.

question: How to change delivery address for an ongoing order?
answer: Contact driver directly via app to request change. Not guaranteed; depends on driver's route and timing.

question: GrabMart items missing from order
answer: Report missing items via app: History > Select Order > Report Issue. Refunds processed within 3-5 business days.

question: How to cancel a subscription service?
answer: Go to Profile > Subscriptions > Select Service > Cancel Subscription. Confirmation will be sent via email.

question: Why is my GrabFood order delayed?
answer: Delays may occur due to high demand, traffic, or restaurant issues. Check app for estimated delivery time and contact support if excessive.

question: How to change delivery address for GrabFood?
answer: You can change the delivery address before placing the order. After placing, contact support immediately for assistance.

question: GrabMart items missing from order
answer: Check receipt for item list. If items are missing, report in app: History > Select Order > Report Issue. We'll investigate.

question: How to cancel a subscription?
answer: Go to Profile > Subscriptions > Select Subscription > Cancel. Confirm cancellation in the pop-up.

question: Why is my GrabFood promo not applying?
answer: Ensure promo is valid, applicable to your order, and meets minimum spend. Contact support if issue persists.

question: How to update payment method for GrabMart?
answer: Go to Profile > Payment Methods > Add/Update Card. Ensure card is valid and 3D Secure enabled.

question: Why can't I access GrabRewards?
answer: Check if your account is active and eligible for rewards. Contact support if you believe you should have access.

question: How to redeem GrabFood vouchers?
answer: Go to Promotions tab > Select voucher > Tap 'Redeem'. Vouchers will be applied at checkout.

question: Why is my GrabPay balance not updating?
answer: Balance updates may take a few minutes. Check transaction history for recent transactions. Contact support if issue persists.

question: How to report a technical issue with the app?
answer: Go to Help Center > Technical Issues > Report Issue. Provide details and screenshots if possible.

question: Unable to scan QR code for payment
answer: Try: 1) Cleaning camera lens 2) Ensuring good lighting 3) Updating app. Alternatively, enter merchant code manually.

question: Why can't I receive OTP for login?
answer: Ensure your number is correct and has network coverage. If using dual SIM, switch default SMS slot. Request OTP again after 1 minute.

question: How do I delete my Grab account?
answer: Go to Help Center > My Account > Delete My Account. Note: All data will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.

question: How to change language in Grab app?
answer: Go to Profile > App Settings > Language. Select your preferred language and restart app for changes to apply.

question: Unable to upload documents in driver app
answer: Ensure file size and format meet requirements. Use stable Wi-Fi. If still failing, try using another device or browser.

question: Why is my GrabPay card not accepted online?
answer: Ensure the merchant accepts prepaid cards. Also check your GrabPay balance and enable online usage in card settings.

question: How to unlink a saved payment method?
answer: Go to Profile > Payment Methods > Select Card > Remove. You must have at least one valid payment method linked.

question: GrabFood shows 'Restaurant unavailable'
answer: This may occur outside operating hours or during high demand. Try again later or choose another restaurant nearby.

question: How to receive e-receipts for my rides?
answer: Receipts are auto-emailed after each ride. Check spam/junk folder. You can also view receipts under History > Select Trip.

question: Can't update profile photo in app
answer: Ensure the image is clear and under 5MB. Avoid using filters or group photos. Try using a different photo format (JPG/PNG).
